text: Stephen Wagner (born January 17, 1977) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey goaltender who played three seasons for the Wichita Thunder in the Central Hockey League (CHL). He was selected by the St. Louis Blues in the 6th round (159th overall) of the 1996 NHL Entry Draft. ==Awards and honours== {| class="wikitable" ! Award !
